CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 7, 1941, pg. 12, reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Wilson Sherrow Purchase New Ford from Pettey - The saying that there are no limits to the field of a hustling salesman was exemplified last week by Walter Pettey, representative of Steel City Motors, 3131 Forbes street, Ma. 8844.  During the week of May 26, Pettey delivered new cars to Lee Fuqua, Pittsburgh; Ralph Weems, Tarentum; Mrs. Bessie Merrell, Boston, Mass.; and Wilson L. Sherrow, of Canonsburg, Pa.  In the picture above, Mr. Pettey is making delivery of a new 1941 Super Deluxe Ford to Mr. and Mrs. Wilson L. Sherrow of Canonsburg, Pa."
TitMainTitle: Unknown woman at wheel of 1941 Super Deluxe Ford car, with Mrs. Sherrow and Steel City Motors car salesman Walter Pettey in back seat, Canonsburg, Pennsylvania
